  • MacOS, CMYK
  • Illuminated Manuscripts

Complete foundational texts re-formatted as monochromes and printed on cellulose. Prints were buried underground on the last day of fall 2012 (Dec 20), and exhumed on the last day of spring 2014.

  • Date of creation: Ongoing
  • Measurements: 44 x 75in (112cm x 183cm)
  • Medium: Inkjet
  • Al Qur'an | PDF (283KB)
  • Bhagavad Gita | PDF (143KB)
  • Crest Jewel of Discrimination | PDF (131KB)
  • Critique of Pure Reason | PDF (602KB)
  • De Docta Ignorantia | PDF (221KB)
  • Hsin Hsin Ming | PDF (74KB)
  • Mūlamadhyamakakārikā | PDF (221KB)
  • New Testament | PDF (594KB)
  • Old Testament | PDF (1.4MB)
  • Phenomenology Of Spirit | PDF (692KB)
  • Philosophical Investigations | PDF (340KB)
  • Tao Te Ching | PDF (115KB)
  • Upanishads | PDF (287KB)
